files.name: .gitignore
files.content:
# ================================
# mg_kiro MCP Server .gitignore
# ================================

# Dependencies
node_modules/
jspm_packages/
web_modules/
bower_components/

# Package manager files
package-lock.json
yarn.lock
pnpm-lock.yaml
.pnpm-store/

# Environment variables (sensitive data)
.env
.env.local
.env.development
.env.development.local
.env.test
.env.test.local
.env.production
.env.production.local
.env.*.local

# Logs
logs/
*.log
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

files.name: jest.config.js
